parameters.name: USB Bus:Device
parameters.description: USB bus and device number in format bus:device (e.g., 1:3 for /dev/bus/usb/001/003)

parameters.name: ID of the VM
parameters.description: ID of the VM to which the USB device will be assigned

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: Optional: UID of the user in the container who should have access to the serial device. Default is 0 (root). If provided, permissions will be set on the host device (mapped UID = container UID + 100000).

parameters.name: GID
parameters.description: Optional: GID of the group in the container who should have access to the serial device. Default is 0 (root). If provided, permissions will be set on the host device (mapped GID = container GID + 100000).

parameters.name: Container Device Path
parameters.description: Optional: Container device path (default: /dev/ttyUSB0). The device will always be available at this path in the container, regardless of the host device path.
